Title: The Phantom of the Opera
Writer: Gaston Leroux (novel), Andrew Lloyd Webber (book), Andrew Lloyd Webber (screenplay), Joel Schumacher (screenplay)
Actors: Gerard Butler, Emmy Rossum, Patrick Wilson, Miranda Richardson
Plot: A young soprano becomes the obsession of a disfigured and murderous musical genius who lives beneath the Paris Opéra House.
Awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 7 wins & 39 nominations.
